tableDescription: Contains comprehensive information about members, ensuring effective management and tracking of member records.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each member, facilitating precise tracking and management of records while ensuring data integrity across related tables.
Full name of the member, providing clear identification and facilitating effective communication across various contexts.
Department of Defense Identification Number (DOD ID), serving as a unique identifier for official identification and record-keeping within the Department of Defense.
Home phone number, enabling direct communication with the member outside official channels.
Social Security Number, uniquely identifying the member for administrative purposes and tracking benefits.
Date of birth formatted as MM/DD/YYYY, used for age verification and eligibility assessments.
Date the member arrived at their current duty station, formatted as MM/DD/YYYY, used for tracking service duration.
Calculated age of the member, providing a quick reference for age-related eligibility.
Personal email address for direct contact outside official channels.
Official military email address for secure communications.
Residential address for correspondence and administrative purposes.
Classification of the member's gender identity for demographic records.
A brief phrase reflecting the member's personal philosophy or outlook.
Official job title indicating the member's position within the organization.
Direct URL to the member's profile image hosted on Amazon S3 for easy access.
Direct link to the member's profile on Glide for quick access to detailed information.
Readiness score from 0 to 100, indicating the member's overall readiness based on completed and incomplete requirements.
Indicates scheduling conflicts, represented as 0 for no conflict and 1 for conflict.
Foreign key reference to the Roles table, linking to the roles_id field to associate the member with their role. (ref: Roles.roles_id)
Foreign key reference to the Jobs table, linking to the jobs_id field to associate the member with their job. (ref: Jobs.jobs_id)
Foreign key reference to the Groups table, linking to the groups_id field to associate the member with their group. (ref: Groups.groups_id)
Foreign key reference to the Squadrons table, linking to the squadrons_id field to accurately associate the member with their squadron. (ref: Squadrons.squadrons_id)
Index for tracking updates related to member entries, allowing for systematic recording and monitoring of any changes.
